expected_goal: Search the web for multilingual customer reviews, clean them, translate to a common language, create embeddings, and cluster them conceptually.

atomic: Search the web for multilingual customer reviews.
Clean and normalize the retrieved review texts.
Translate all reviews to a common target language.
Generate text embeddings for the translated reviews.
Cluster the embeddings to group reviews by concept or meaning.
macro: Search the web for multilingual customer reviews.
Clean and normalize the retrieved review texts.
Translate all reviews to a common target language.
Generate text embeddings for the translated reviews.
Cluster the embeddings to group reviews by concept or meaning.
